label: logicA:network_security_en
steps: [1] If a host makes repeated connections to a known command-and-control (C2) domain, the host is classified as compromised.
[2] If a host is classified as compromised, the host is isolated from the network.
[3] For any asset x, if x lacks the critical security patch KB-5021234, then x is vulnerable to remote code execution.
[4] Workstation W-17 lacks the critical security patch KB-5021234.
[5] Workstation W-17 made repeated connections to a known command-and-control (C2) domain.
[6] Workstation W-17 is classified as compromised (from [1] and [5]).
[7] Workstation W-17 is isolated from the network (from [2] and [6]).
[8] Workstation W-17 is vulnerable to remote code execution (from [3] and [4]).
[9] Workstation W-17 is isolated from the network and vulnerable to remote code execution (from [7] and [8]).
